turned on to it,'' said NBA deputy commissioner Russ Granik , who was at Philadelphia's First Union Center on Wednesday night, when Allen Iverson scored 54 points to Vince Carter 's 28 in the 76ers' 97-92 victory. For better or worse, fans like it when you get superstars going against each other. People have been hearing about these guys for years now, but they haven't gotten this far before where they met each other at this level. That gets people interested. But it contains few surprises and, after so many years of divisive debate, is unlikely to change many minds, writes Howard Kurtz .`` What is known is that he has in these 50 chapters marshaled his best defense; only history's final verdict remains unknown.''
